page.title:
Current Aura Air Quality Activities
Current Aura Air Quality Activities

page.normal_text:
Air pollution often travels above boundary layer & impacts surface via subsidence and/or fumigation.
Air pollution often travels above boundary
layer & impacts surface via subsidence
and/or fumigation.

page.title:
Data Product Intercomparison Issues
Data Product Intercomparison Issues
page.enlisting:
• Talks by Fishman, Yang, & Pickering raised issue: How do we compare Aura tropospheric ozone products using residual methods?  Difficulties arise due to various tropopause definitions. Therefore, standard definition is required. But which one? Compute TCO > 500 mb instead? • Lack of spatial continuity of cross-track observations • Coarseness of stratospheric column ozone removal. • Should NASA support more near-real time data • Talks by Fishman, Yang, & Pickering raised issue: How do we compare Aura tropospheric ozone products using residual methods?

in regional/global models?

page.title:
Vertical Composition Information
Vertical Composition Information
page.enlisting:
• Vertical profile information is critical for assessing transport & air quality (e.g., above boundary layer versus near-surface composition and transport). • Necessary to understand long-range transport versus in situ production of pollution. • Vertical profile information is critical for assessing transport & air quality (e.g., above boundary layer versus near-surface composition and transport).

page.title:
The Future
The Future
page.enlisting:
• The working group only touched the surface of all of the issues related to use of Aura data for air quality. We needed more time. • Suggest keeping the dialog ongoing through e-mail • The working group only touched the surface of all of the issues related to use of Aura data for air quality.
